items.sentence: Everything was fine until Tom started drinking.
Tom knew that he couldn\'t reach the top shelf.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to have any fun.
I don\'t think that that\'s Tom\'s handwriting.
I\'d rather go shopping with you than with Tom.
I\'d really like to go swimming this afternoon.
I\'ll ask Tom to meet us here tomorrow at 2:30.
I\'ll be at your place in about thirty minutes.
I don\'t think Tom can afford to buy a car yet.
I don\'t think Tom could see what was going on.
